content: 1 description a home-themed decorative mandala wall hanging designed for our 117-year-old cottage this is a quick one day project less if you re a fast crocheter using bits of yarn from my stash however you can increase or decrease the size depending on your yarn weight and hook size i ve used a 10 embroidery hoop removed the gauge screw and attached a hangy-thingy but of course you can use any other additional bling or keep it sweet and simple this is a great project to make when you re relaxing between more challenging projects 2 skill level there is a full instruction video so you can t go wrong even if you re a beginner 3 crochet terms us but go up a size for uk terms eg us single_crochet = uk double_crochet 4 yarn stash-busted scheepjes stone washed and linen soft colours and codes are at the beginning of each round 5 hook size 4mm 6 completed size 25cm/ 10 diameter 7 additional materials 10 embroidery hoop tapestry needle craft scissors hangy-thingy optional in this case an unused key ring pattern workshop group https //www facebook com/groups/thefloralhookpatternworkshopgroup
